title: Journal of Traditional Chinese Medicine - Wikipedia
cleaned_text: Journal of Traditional Chinese Traditional Chinese Medicine was the first English-language journal on the subject of [complementary and alternative medicine](/wiki/Complementary_and_alternative_medicine). The journal was original established in Chinese as Chung i tsa chih ying wen pan in 1955. The English edition of the Journal of Traditional Chinese Medicine was first published in 1981. It is jointly sponsored and published by the [China Association of Chinese Medicine](/w/index.php?title=China_Association_of_Chinese_Medicine&action=edit&redlink=1) and the [China Academy of Chinese Medical Sciences](/w/index.php?title=China_Academy_of_Chinese_Medical_Sciences&action=edit&redlink=1). Its headquarters are in Beijing. The journal is also published in German, Italian, Spanish, French and Portuguese editions. Abstracting and indexing[ [edit](/w/index.php?title=Journal_of_Traditional_Chinese_Medicine&action=edit§ion=1)] The journal is Matrix for the Analysis of Journals. [University of Barcelona](/wiki/University_of_Barcelona). Retrieved 2018-07-04.
